data.actual_result: The user is shown a message telling them to create an invite to add members to the channel despite not having access to it themself
data.expected_result: The user should be shown a message stating they do not have permission to join the channel
data.short_description: Users are shown screen suggesting to invite new members to voice channels which they cannot access
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a guild with at least one voice channel that you have permission to view but not join - Attempt to join the locked voice channel - Observe the message stating "Feelin' lonely? Add friends to this voice channel by creating an invite link."
